translation.en: THIS JOB IS EATING ME ALIVE.
translation.zh: 这工作把我整死

translation.en: I CAN'T BREATHE ANYMORE.
translation.zh: 我快喘不过气了

translation.en: I SPENT ALL THESE YEARS TRYING TO BE THE GOOD GUY,
translation.zh: 这些年来我一直努力做个好人

translation.en: THE MAN IN THE WHITE HAT.
translation.zh: 想当个英雄

translation.en: I'M NOT BECOMING LIKE THEM.
translation.zh: 我不是要成为像英雄的人

translation.en: I AM THEM.
translation.zh: 而是成为真正的英雄

translation.en: HEY! WHAT ARE YOU DOING, WEIRDO?
translation.zh: 喂 怪胎 你在干嘛？

translation.en: I'M DOING THE BEST SPEECH FROM DONNIE BRASCO.
translation.zh: 我在念《忠奸人》里的经典台词

translation.en: OR ACTUALLY, TEN OF ME ARE DOING THE BEST SPEECH FROM DONNIE BRASCO.
translation.zh:
其实是十个我同时
在念《忠奸人》里的经典台词

translation.en: WHAT'S UP?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: GET IT TOGETHER, MAN. OKAY?
translation.zh: 正经一点 好吗？

translation.en: SO THE STORE WAS HIT ABOUT TWO HOURS AGO.
translation.zh: 这间店两小时前被抢劫了

translation.en: THEY TOOK MOSTLY TABLETS, LAPTOPS, AND CAMERAS.
translation.zh:
抢匪偷走了平板电脑
手提电脑和照相机

translation.en: [music stops] SORRY.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I'D LIKE A LIST OF ALL YOUR EMPLOYEES, WHOEVER HAD ACCESS TO THE STORE.
translation.zh: 请给我有商店钥匙的员工名单

translation.en: I'D ALSO LIKE TO APOLOGIZE FOR MY PARTNER.
translation.zh: 我还要为我的搭档向你道歉

translation.en: HIS PARENTS DIDN'T GIVE HIM ENOUGH ATTENTION.
translation.zh: 他父母没有把他管教好

translation.en: UH, DETECTIVE... I ALREADY SOLVED THE CASE.
translation.zh: 警探 我已经破案了

translation.en: WE'RE LOOKING FOR THREE WHITE MALES, ONE OF WHOM HAS SLEEVE TATS ON BOTH ARMS.
translation.zh:
嫌犯是三名白人男性
其中一名双手满是刺青

translation.en: AND HOW DO YOU KNOW THAT?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: I HAD AN INFORMANT ON THE INSIDE.
translation.zh: 因为我有个内应

translation.en: HE'S BEEN HERE FOR YEARS.
translation.zh: 他在这里好几年了

translation.en: WATCHING, LEARNING. WAITING.
translation.zh: 观察 学习 等待

translation.en: HIS CODE NAME?
translation.zh: 他的代号呢？

translation.en: FUZZY CUDDLE BEAR.
translation.zh: 绒毛抱抱熊

translation.en: HE'S A NANNY CAM.
translation.zh: 它是个针孔摄像机

translation.en: [scoffs] YOU GOT LUCKY.
translation.zh: 你走狗屎运

translation.en: NO, I GOT HERE FIVE MINUTES BEFORE YOU
translation.zh: 我比你早到五分钟

translation.en: AND FIGURED THAT IN THIS GIGANTIC ELECTRONICS STORE, THERE HAD TO BE AT LEAST ONE WORKING CAMERA.
translation.zh:
心想这间电子产品专卖店
肯定有装监视摄像机吧

translation.en: OH! HI, BAD GUYS!
translation.zh: 嗨 坏蛋们

translation.en: YOU DID IT, FUZZY. YOU BUSTED 'EM.
translation.zh: 绒毛熊 你做到了 你逮到他们

translation.en: IT'S TIME TO COME HOME.
translation.zh: 是时候可以回家了

translation.en: [as Fuzzy] I'M NOT SURE IF I CAN.
translation.zh: 我不确定呢

translation.en: I'VE BEEN UNDERCOVER SO LONG, I'VE FORGOTTEN WHO I AM.
translation.zh: 我当卧底太久了 已经忘了自己是谁

translation.en: I HAVE SEEN TERRIBLE THINGS.
translation.zh: 看过太多可怕的东西

translation.en: I HAVEN'T KNOWN THE TOUCH OF A WOMAN IN MANY MOONS.
translation.zh: 好久都没有碰过女人了

translation.en: ALL RIGHT.
translation.zh: 够了

translation.en: DETECTIVE SANTIAGO!
translation.zh: 桑蒂亚戈警探

translation.en: DON'T WALK AWAY FROM ME!
translation.zh: 不要离开我

translation.en: (Jake) YES, I DID CRACK THE CASE.
translation.zh:
（第99分局
　早晨简报 早上8点31分） 是我破案的
桑蒂亚戈 可以劳烦你吗？

translation.en: SO, SANTIAGO, WOULD YOU DO THE HONORS?
translation.zh:
是我破案的
桑蒂亚戈 可以劳烦你吗？

translation.en: (all) OHHH!
translation.zh: （普拉尔塔：23 桑蒂亚戈：22）

translation.en: I HATE THIS!
translation.zh:
（普拉尔塔：23 桑蒂亚戈：22） -讨厌死了
-好耶

translation.en: (Jake) AH, YEAH.
translation.zh:
-讨厌死了
-好耶

translation.en: I HATE THIS. AND YOU'RE JUST GONNA ADD ONE.
translation.zh:
-讨厌死了
-加一就好

translation.en: I'M WINNING.
translation.zh: 我领先了

translation.en: IT'S A GOOD FEELING. IT'S A GOOD FEELING. YEAH.
translation.zh: 感觉真爽

translation.en: ENJOY IT WHILE IT LASTS. I WILL!
translation.zh:
-把握机会尽情得意吧
-我会的

translation.en: JP, UPDATE ON THE MORGENTHAU MURDER?
translation.zh: 小杰 报告一下摩根托凶杀案

translation.en: YEAH! GOOD NEWS FOR ALL YOU MURDER FANS.
translation.zh: 对你们这些凶杀案迷来说是好消息

translation.en: [laughter] EARLIER THIS MORNING...
translation.zh: 今天稍早的时候

translation.en: SOMEONE DECIDED TO SHOOT AND KILL LUXURY FOOD IMPORTER HENRY MORGENTHAU.
translation.zh:
有人决定要枪杀高档食品进口商
亨利摩根托

translation.en: BODY WAS FOUND BY THE CLEANING LADY,
translation.zh: 尸体被清洁女工发现

translation.en: DURING HER INTERVIEW, I DEDUCED, USING EXPERT DETECTIVE WORK,
translation.zh:
在替她录口供时
我发挥专业的侦探精神推断出

translation.en: THAT SHE HAD SOMETHING SUPER GROSS ON HER CHIN.
translation.zh: 她的下巴沾了某种恶心的东西

translation.en: I THINK IT WAS FLAN.
translation.zh: 我认为是果馅饼

translation.en: CHARLES THINKS IT WAS FLAN. I THINK IT WAS BUTTERSCOTCH PUDDING.
translation.zh:
查尔斯认为是果馅饼
我认为是奶油糖果布丁

translation.en: MAYBE IT WAS JUST OLD PERSON GUNK.
translation.zh: 那是老人的黏状物吧

translation.en: YOU KNOW HOW OLD PEOPLE ALWAYS HAVE THAT GUNK ON THEM.
translation.zh: 老年人的身上总是有黏黏的东西

translation.en: OLDIE GUNK. COULD BE, YEAH.
translation.zh: 老人的黏状物 有可能 还有呢？

translation.en: ANYONE ELSE? HOW ABOUT WE FOCUS ON THE MURDER
translation.zh:
不如把焦点放回案件上
别再谈老人的黏状物 好吗？

translation.en: AND NOT THE OLD PERSON GUNK?
translation.zh:
不如把焦点放回案件上
别再谈老人的黏状物 好吗？ 犯罪调查技术员在现场了
等他们收工 我们再过去

translation.en: CRIME TECHS ARE AT THE SCENE NOW.
translation.zh:
犯罪调查技术员在现场了
等他们收工 我们再过去

translation.en: WE'RE HEADING BACK WHEN THEY'RE DONE. OKAY, I WANT YOU ON THIS. IT'S GONNA BE PRIORITY ONE FOR THE NEW C.O.
translation.zh:
你们要尽力破案
新局长会把这案子列为第一要务

translation.en: WAIT, TELL US ABOUT THE NEW CAPTAIN.
translation.zh: 跟我们说说新局长的事

translation.en: CAPTAIN HOLT WILL BE HERE SOON. HE'LL WANNA INTRODUCE HIMSELF.
translation.zh:
霍尔特局长马上就会到任
到时他会自我介绍

translation.en: DISMISSED.
translation.zh: 散会 （文职行政人员）

translation.en: HEY, GINA. YOU KNOW ANY SCALPERS?
translation.zh: 吉娜 你有认识的黄牛吗？

translation.en: I WANNA ASK ROSA TO GO TO THE RIHANNA CONCERT WITH ME, BUT IT'S SOLD OUT.
translation.zh:
我想请萝莎去听蕾哈娜的演唱会
但票卖光了

translation.en: OKAY, TWO POINTS TO MAKE HERE.
translation.zh: 好 我有两点意见

translation.en: FIRST, RIHANNA... YOU... AND THEN RIHANNA.
translation.zh:
第一点 蕾哈娜的演唱会？
你这副德性 但蕾哈娜…

translation.en: YEAH. WHAT'S YOUR SECOND POINT?
translation.zh: 好吧 第二点呢？

translation.en: SHE'S GOT A TYPE. WHICH IS REALLY ANYONE BUT YOU.
translation.zh:
她喜欢的男人类型
就是除了你之外的任何人

translation.en: YEAH, THAT WAS MY EX-WIFE'S TYPE TOO.
translation.zh: 跟我的前妻一样

translation.en: LOOK, A RIHANNA CONCERT'S A PRETTY BIG SWING, MAN.
translation.zh:
听我说 去蕾哈娜的演唱会
可要大费周章

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW. SHE'S INTO WATCHING OLD MOVIES.
translation.zh:
-不一定会成功 但她喜欢看老电影
-好主意

translation.en: COOL. WHERE WOULD I FIND A PLACE THAT SHOWS OLD MOVIES?
translation.zh: 哪里有放映老电影的戏院？

translation.en: OH, YEAH, JUST GO ON THE INTERNET
translation.zh: 上网搜寻 打关键词

translation.en: AND SEARCH FOR THE PHRASE "I WANT TO BUY TWO MOVIE TICKETS
translation.zh:
上网搜寻 打关键词 “我想买两张电影票
　跟不喜欢我的女生一起看戏”

translation.en: FOR A GIRL WHO DOESN'T LIKE ME."
translation.zh:
“我想买两张电影票
　跟不喜欢我的女生一起看戏”

translation.en: GREAT. THANK YOU. GOOD.
translation.zh:
-太好了 谢谢你
-不客气

translation.en: HEY, YOU HEARD ANYTHING ABOUT THE NEW CAPTAIN?
translation.zh: 你有听过关于新局长的事吗？ 没有 我也没兴趣

translation.en: UH, NO, AND I DON'T CARE.
translation.zh: 没有 我也没兴趣

translation.en: I JUST WISH CAPTAIN MCGINTLEY NEVER LEFT, HE WAS THE BEST.
translation.zh:
我只希望麦基特利局长不要走
他是最好的局长了

translation.en: HE WAS TERRIBLE.
translation.zh: 他很差劲

translation.en: YOU JUST LIKED HIM 'CAUSE HE LET YOU DO ANYTHING YOU WANTED.
translation.zh: 你喜欢他 是因为他让你随心所欲

translation.en: ON YOUR MARKS, GET SET... GO.
translation.zh:
-各就各位 预备
-开始

translation.en: WHAT THE HELL'S GOING ON AROUND HERE?
translation.zh: 这是在搞什么鬼？

translation.en: FIRE EXTINGUISHER ROLLER CHAIR DERBY?
translation.zh: 在举行灭火器滚轮椅大赛

translation.en: OKAY.
translation.zh: 继续吧

translation.en: AND GO!
translation.zh: 开始

translation.en: WHAT'S YOUR POINT?
translation.zh: 你的重点是什么？

translation.en: IF I'M EVER GONNA MAKE CAPTAIN, I NEED A GOOD MENTOR. I NEED MY RABBI.
translation.zh:
如果我想升做局长
我需要一位导师和师父

translation.en: SORRY, DUDE...
translation.zh: 你要失望了 这新局长肯定是个官僚作风的上司

translation.en: BUT THIS NEW GUY'S GONNA BE ANOTHER WASHED-UP PENCIL PUSHER
translation.zh: 这新局长肯定是个官僚作风的上司

translation.en: WHO'S ONLY CONCERNED WITH... [robotically] FOLLOWING EVERY RULE IN THE PATROL GUIDE.
translation.zh: 凡事只会拿规条当准则

translation.en: MEEP MORP ZEEP. ROBOT CAPTAIN ENGAGE.
translation.zh: 机器人局长上任

translation.en: IS THAT WHAT YOU THINK? HE-HEY!
translation.zh:
-你是这么想的吗？
-嘿

translation.en: NEW CAPTAIN ALERT. [laughs]
translation.zh: 新局长驾到

translation.en: YOU MUST BE THE NEW C.O.
translation.zh: 你肯定就是新局长了

translation.en: I'M DETECTIVE JAKE PERALTA. GREAT TO MEET YOU.
translation.zh: 我是杰克普拉尔塔警探 幸会

translation.en: NOW DON'T LET ME INTERRUPT. YOU WERE DESCRIBING WHAT KIND OF PERSON I'M GONNA BE.
translation.zh:
别被我打断了
继续形容我是哪种人吧

translation.en: I'D LIKE YOU TO FINISH.
translation.zh: 继续把话说完

translation.en: THAT'S NOT NECESSARY.
translation.zh: 没这个必要吧

translation.en: OR I COULD RECAP VERY QUICKLY, SURE.
translation.zh: 或者我可以很快地重来一遍

translation.en: UM, LET'S SEE.
translation.zh: 我想想看

translation.en: I THINK I SAID SOME JOKE ABOUT BEING A WASHED-UP PENCIL PUSHER.
translation.zh: 我刚说了一个有关官僚上司的笑话

translation.en: NOW DO THE ROBOT VOICE. WHICH--
translation.zh: 用机器人的声音来说

translation.en: THE ROBOT VOICE YOU WERE DOING WHEN YOU IMPLIED I'M A RULE-FOLLOWING ROBOT.
translation.zh:
跟刚才你暗讽我是只会
拿规条当准则的机器人时一样

translation.en: I WANNA HEAR IT AGAIN.
translation.zh: 我很想听听看

translation.en: ROBOT.
translation.zh: 机器人

translation.en: THAT'S A TERRIBLE ROBOT VOICE. YEP.
translation.zh: 好难听的机器人声音

translation.en: THE NEXT TIME I SEE YOU,
translation.zh: 下次见面 我要看到你打领带

translation.en: I'D LIKE YOU TO BE WEARING A NECKTIE.
translation.zh: 下次见面 我要看到你打领带 前任局长不在意我们有没有打领带

translation.en: OH, ACTUALLY, THE LAST CAPTAIN DIDN'T CARE IF WE WORE TIES.
translation.zh: 前任局长不在意我们有没有打领带

translation.en: WELL, YOUR NEW CAPTAIN DOES.
translation.zh: 新局长在意

translation.en: AND MORE IMPORTANTLY, HE CARES THAT YOU FOLLOW HIS DIRECT ORDERS.
translation.zh:
更重要的是
他在意你有没有服从他的命令

translation.en: EVERYONE, I'M YOUR NEW COMMANDING OFFICER, CAPTAIN RAY HOLT.
translation.zh: 各位 我是新来的雷霍尔特局长

translation.en: SPEECH! THAT WAS MY SPEECH.
translation.zh:
-请发表谈话
-发表完了

translation.en: SHORT AND SWEET.
translation.zh: 简而有力

translation.en: SERGEANT JEFFORDS, A WORD.
translation.zh: 杰福兹警官 进来说句话

translation.en: YES, SIR.
translation.zh: 好的 长官

translation.en: [sighs] I LOVE THAT GUY. SAME!
translation.zh:
-我喜欢他
-我也是

translation.en: HE'S SO SUAVE.
translation.zh: 他好斯文呀

translation.en: DOES ANYONE GET A LITTLE BIT OF A GAY VIBE?
translation.zh: 有人闻到同性恋的味道吗？

translation.en: NO? OKAY.
translation.zh: 没有吗？好吧

translation.en: SERGEANT, YOU WERE IN THE 1-8 WITH ME...
translation.zh: （雷霍尔特局长） 警官 我们以前在第18分局共事过

translation.en: THOUGH YOU WERE SIGNIFICANTLY--
translation.zh: 警官 我们以前在第18分局共事过 只不过那时的你比较…

translation.en: FATTER, SIR. THEY CALLED ME "TERRY TITTIES."
translation.zh: 比较胖 大家都叫我泰瑞大咪咪

translation.en: BECAUSE I HAD LARGE, UH--
translation.zh: 因为我有一双大…

translation.en: TITTIES, YES. I REMEMBER.
translation.zh: 大咪咪 对 我还记得

translation.en: I NEVER LIKED THAT NICKNAME.
translation.zh: 我一向不喜欢那个绰号

translation.en: THOUGH TO BE FAIR, IT WAS ACCURATE.
translation.zh: 但说句公道话 还挺贴切的

translation.en: WHAT'S THIS I HEAR ABOUT YOU BEING ON ADMINISTRATIVE LEAVE?
translation.zh:
听说你正在休行政假
这是怎么回事？

translation.en: A YEAR AGO, MY WIFE AND I HAD TWIN BABY GIRLS.
translation.zh: 一年前 我老婆生了双胞胎女儿

translation.en: CAGNEY AND LACEY.
translation.zh: 卡格妮和莱西

translation.en: THEY HAVE ADORABLE CHUBBY CHEEKS.
translation.zh: 脸颊胖嘟嘟的 很可爱

translation.en: EVER SINCE, I KINDA GOT SCARED OF GETTING HURT.
translation.zh: 自从那时起 我就很怕自己受伤

translation.en: LOST MY EDGE.
translation.zh: 失去了办案能力

translation.en: THERE WAS AN INCIDENT IN A DEPARTMENT STORE.
translation.zh: 曾经在百货公司发生了一件事

translation.en: HEY, MAN, YOU OKAY? YOU LOOK A LITTLE JUMPY.
translation.zh: 你还好吗？你看起来很紧张

translation.en: I'M FINE. I'M FINE.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: I THINK HE'S DEAD.
translation.zh: 他好像死了

translation.en: AND I'M STILL NOT RIGHT.
translation.zh: 我到现在还没恢复过来

translation.en: TELL ME ABOUT YOUR DETECTIVE SQUAD.
translation.zh: 跟我介绍一下你的小队

translation.en: WELL, SCULLY, HITCHCOCK, AND DANIELS. THEY'RE PRETTY MUCH WORTHLESS,
translation.zh:
史考利 希区柯克和丹尼尔
几乎毫无用处

translation.en: BUT THEY MAKE GOOD COFFEE.
translation.zh: 但他们很会冲泡咖啡

translation.en: COPY THAT.
translation.zh: 知道了

translation.en: NOW THE GOOD ONES.
translation.zh: 再来是厉害的那几个

translation.en: ROSA DIAZ. TOUGH, SMART, HARD TO READ, AND REALLY SCARY.
translation.zh:
萝莎迪亚兹 强悍 聪明
难以捉摸 而且很吓人

translation.en: TELL ME WHO HAS ME FOR SECRET SANTA.
translation.zh: 告诉我谁是我的神秘圣诞老人

translation.en: NO! THAT TAKES ALL THE FUN OUT OF IT.
translation.zh: 不行 那样就不好玩了

translation.en: IT'S SCULLY. HE GOT YOU A SCARF. I'LL MAKE HIM RETURN IT.
translation.zh:
是史考利 他给你买了一条围巾
我会叫他拿去退货

translation.en: YES, YOU WILL.
translation.zh: 最好如此

translation.en: CHARLES BOYLE. HE'S A GRINDER.
translation.zh: 查尔斯博伊尔 苦干型的

translation.en: NOT THE MOST BRILLIANT DETECTIVE, BUT HE WORKS HARDER THAN ANYONE ELSE.
translation.zh:
头脑不是最聪明的
但他比谁都要勤奋

translation.en: HE'S NOT PHYSICALLY GIFTED.
translation.zh: 他的身手…不是很灵活

translation.en: OH, MAN! MY MUFFIN.
translation.zh: 天啊 我的松饼

translation.en: OH, MY HEAD! MY MUFFIN, MY HEAD!
translation.zh: 我的头 我的松饼 我的头

translation.en: AND I STEPPED ON THE-- ON MY MUFFIN! AND MY HEAD AND MY MUFFIN.
translation.zh:
我踩到我的松饼了
我的头和我的松饼啊

translation.en: AMY SANTIAGO.
translation.zh: 艾咪桑蒂亚戈 她有七个兄弟

translation.en: SHE'S GOT SEVEN BROTHERS,
translation.zh: 她有七个兄弟 她总是想证明自己有多强悍

translation.en: SO SHE'S ALWAYS TRYING TO PROVE SHE'S TOUGH.
translation.zh: 她总是想证明自己有多强悍

translation.en: CAREFUL. THAT STUFF'S PRETTY HOT.
translation.zh: 小心点 那很辣的

translation.en: OH, IS IT? HMM?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: SHE AND PERALTA HAVE SOME BIG BET OVER WHO GETS MORE ARRESTS THIS YEAR.
translation.zh:
她跟普拉尔塔打了一个很大的赌
看谁今年逮到更多的坏蛋

translation.en: EVER SINCE THE BET, THEIR NUMBERS HAVE GONE WAY UP.
translation.zh:
自从赌局开始后
他们的破案数字就直直上升

translation.en: TELL ME ABOUT PERALTA. JACOB PERALTA IS MY BEST DETECTIVE.
translation.zh:
-跟我说说这个普拉尔塔
-杰克普拉尔塔是我队上最出色的

translation.en: HE LIKES PUTTING AWAY BAD GUYS AND HE LOVES SOLVING PUZZLES.
translation.zh: 他喜欢除暴安良 也很爱破解谜题

translation.en: THE ONLY PUZZLE HE HASN'T SOLVED IS HOW TO GROW UP.
translation.zh:
他唯一破解不了的谜题
就是要如何长大

translation.en: THAT WAS VERY WELL PUT.
translation.zh: 说得太贴切了

translation.en: I'VE TALKED A LOT ABOUT JAKE IN MY DEPARTMENTALLY MANDATED THERAPY SESSIONS.
translation.zh:
在警局强制要求我做心理咨询时
我谈了很多关于杰克的事

translation.en: LOOK, YOU KNOW MY HISTORY. YOU KNOW HOW IMPORTANT THIS IS TO ME.
translation.zh:
你了解我的工作经历
应该知道这职位对我有多重要

translation.en: THIS PRECINCT IS DOING FINE, BUT I WANNA MAKE IT THE BEST ONE IN BROOKLYN.
translation.zh:
这个分局表现不俗
但我要让它成为布鲁克林最棒的分局

translation.en: AND I NEED YOUR HELP. ABSOLUTELY, SIR.
translation.zh:
-我需要你的帮忙
-没问题 长官

translation.en: WHERE DO WE START?
translation.zh: 要从哪里开始着手？

translation.en: ♪ WHAT IS HAPPENING? ♪
translation.zh: 发生什么事了？

translation.en: WE START WITH HIM.
translation.zh: 就从他开始

translation.en: OKAY, SO THE PERP CAME IN THROUGH THE WINDOW,
translation.zh: 歹徒破窗而入

translation.en: LEFT THE MUDDY RED FOOTPRINT, AND APPARENTLY HAD SEX WITH THE DISH RACK.
translation.zh:
留下了红泥脚印
显然还跟碗盘架子翻云覆雨了

translation.en: SHELL CASING FOUND HERE. TWO SHOTS. BANG, BANG.
translation.zh: 在这里发现了弹壳 开了两枪 砰砰

translation.en: GREAT WORK, DETECTIVE.
translation.zh: 做得好 警探 奖你一条领带

translation.en: YOU GET A TIE.
translation.zh: 做得好 警探 奖你一条领带 那是我的 你从我桌上拿走的

translation.en: HEY, THAT'S MINE. YOU TOOK IT FROM MY DESK.
translation.zh: 那是我的 你从我桌上拿走的

translation.en: THAT'S RIGHT, CHARLES. GOOD SOLVE.
translation.zh: 没错 查尔斯 好眼力 这条给你

translation.en: TIE FOR YOU. THANKS!
translation.zh:
没错 查尔斯 好眼力 这条给你 -谢谢
-一定要打上呀

translation.en: NOW EVERYONE BE SURE TO PUT THOSE ON
translation.zh:
-谢谢
-一定要打上呀

translation.en: BECAUSE IT'S IMPOSSIBLE TO SOLVE CRIMES UNLESS YOU'RE WEARING A TIE.
translation.zh: 因为没有打领带就破不了案啦

translation.en: LAY OFF THE CAPTAIN. THAT MAN IS GONNA BE MY RABBI.
translation.zh:
别拿局长开玩笑了
我要认他做我的师父

translation.en: OKAY, FIRST OF ALL, WHEN YOU USE THE WORD "RABBI,"
translation.zh:
首先 你每次一说“师父”这两个字
我就会欲火攻心

translation.en: YOU KNOW THAT TURNS ME ON
translation.zh:
首先 你每次一说“师父”这两个字
我就会欲火攻心 在工作时这样不太妥当吧

translation.en: AND THAT'S UNFAIR IN THE WORK ENVIRONMENT.
translation.zh: 在工作时这样不太妥当吧 其次 你师父把我当作眼中钉了

translation.en: SECONDLY, YOUR RABBI IS A PAIN IN MY ASS.
translation.zh: 其次 你师父把我当作眼中钉了

translation.en: YEAH, HE'S A LITTLE TOO SERIOUS.
translation.zh: 他有点太严肃了 萝莎 你认为呢？

translation.en: WHAT DO YOU THINK, ROSA? HE SEEMS COOL.
translation.zh:
他有点太严肃了 萝莎 你认为呢？ -他不错呀
-是 我同意

translation.en: YEAH, HE SEEMS COOL. I AGREE.
translation.zh:
-他不错呀
-是 我同意

translation.en: LOOKS LIKE THE PERP STOLE A COMPUTER, A WATCH,
translation.zh: 看来歹徒偷走了一台电脑 一支手表

translation.en: AND A JAMON IBERICO HAM, VALUED AT--WHAT!
translation.zh: 还有一条伊比利亚火腿 价值… 什么？六千元
什么？六千元

translation.en: $6,000 FOR A HAM?
translation.zh: 一条火腿价值六千元？

translation.en: JAMON IBERICO IS AN AMAZING CURED HAM FROM SPAIN.
translation.zh:
伊比利亚火腿
是来自西班牙的顶级腌制火腿

translation.en: THEY HAD IT AT MY UNCLE'S FUNERAL. I GORGED MYSELF AT THAT FUNERAL.
translation.zh:
我叔叔的丧礼上有这道料理
我拼命吃了很多

translation.en: I MEAN, I WAS CONSTIPATED FOR THREE DAYS.
translation.zh: 结果便秘了三天

translation.en: WOW, THAT'S A GREAT STORY, CHARLES, THANK YOU.
translation.zh: 哇 这故事真精彩 查尔斯 谢谢你

translation.en: [laughing] ALL RIGHT, LISTEN UP, EVERYBODY.
translation.zh: 各位 听好了

translation.en: BETTER CONTACT CAPTAIN HOLT, LET HIM KNOW WE GOT A TEN-TIE SITUATION.
translation.zh:
最好通知一下霍尔特局长
我们全都打上领带了

translation.en: SPEAKING OF TIES, WHERE'S YOURS, MEEP MORP?
translation.zh: 说到领带 你的在哪里？

translation.en: THIS IS FANTASTIC.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: CAPTAIN! HEY!
translation.zh: 局长 你好呀

translation.en: WELCOME TO THE MURDER. WHAT ARE YOU DOING HERE?
translation.zh: 欢迎来到凶案现场 你怎么会来？

translation.en: I LIKE TO KNOW WHAT MY DETECTIVES ARE UP TO. THAT OKAY BY YOU? YEP.
translation.zh:
我想知道我的手下在忙些什么
可以吗？

translation.en: TAKE SANTIAGO AND KNOCK ON DOORS. SEE IF THE NEIGHBORS HEARD ANYTHING.
translation.zh:
你和桑蒂亚戈去敲门
看邻居们有没有听到什么

translation.en: DOOR DUTY? IT'S A WASTE OF TIME.
translation.zh: 逐户调查？根本浪费时间

translation.en: DIAZ AND BOYLE. CHECK IN THE CORONER. REPORT BACK TO ME IN AN HOUR.
translation.zh:
迪亚兹 博伊尔 去法医那里
一小时后向我报告

translation.en: [sighs] THAT WENT WELL. NO, IT DIDN'T.
translation.zh:
-进展得真顺利
-一点也不顺利

translation.en: HE'S GOT LIKE SUPER HEARING.
translation.zh: 他的耳力真惊人

translation.en: HEY, ROSA! ROSA. ROSA!
translation.zh: 萝莎

translation.en: UM, I JUST HAPPENED TO NOTICE
translation.zh: 我刚好知道 这个星期有一个怀旧电影节

translation.en: THAT THERE'S AN OLD MOVIE FESTIVAL PLAYING AT THE FILM FORUM THIS WEEK.
translation.zh: 这个星期有一个怀旧电影节

translation.en: WANNA GO? SURE.
translation.zh:
-想去吗？
-好啊

translation.en: COOL! AWESOME.
translation.zh: 太好了 真棒

translation.en: THERE'S A BUNCH OF MOVIE OPTIONS.
translation.zh: 有好几部电影可以挑选

translation.en: I'LL PROBABLY JUST GO WITH SOMETHING CLASSIC
translation.zh:
我可能会选
《公民凯恩》这类的经典电影

translation.en: LIKE CITIZEN KANE.
translation.zh:
我可能会选
《公民凯恩》这类的经典电影 《公民凯恩》难看死了
挑一部好看的

translation.en: CITIZEN KANE IS TERRIBLE. PICK A GOOD MOVIE.
translation.zh:
《公民凯恩》难看死了
挑一部好看的

translation.en: GOOD CALL. SMART.
translation.zh: 好主意 明智的决定

translation.en: I'LL DO IT. I'LL PICK A BETTER MOVIE THAN CITIZEN KANE.
translation.zh:
没问题
我会挑一部比《公民凯恩》更好看的

translation.en: (Holt) SO GINA...
translation.zh: 吉娜

translation.en: CIVILIAN ADMINISTRATORS LIKE YOURSELF OFTEN HAVE THEIR EAR TO THE GROUND.
translation.zh:
像你这样的文职行政人员
通常都是耳听八方的

translation.en: WHAT DO SANTIAGO AND PERALTA HAVE RIDING ON THIS BET OF THEIRS?
translation.zh:
桑蒂亚戈和普拉尔塔
拿什么来当赌注？

translation.en: I WILL TELL YOU ON SIX CONDITIONS.
translation.zh: 你先答应我六个条件 我才会告诉你

translation.en: NUMBER ONE, YOU LET ME USE YOUR OFFICE TO PRACTICE MY DANCE MOVES.
translation.zh: 第一 借我你的办公室来练舞

translation.en: SECOND-- HOW ABOUT THIS? IF YOU TELL ME... MM-HMM.
translation.zh:
-第二…
-不如这样吧 如果你告诉我

translation.en: I WON'T HAVE YOU SUSPENDED... WITHOUT PAY.
translation.zh: 我就不会让你停职兼停薪

translation.en: OH, THAT SOUNDS GREAT.
translation.zh: 听起来不错

translation.en: OKAY, THE DEAL IS IF AMY GETS MORE ARRESTS, JAKE HAS TO GIVE HER HIS CAR.
translation.zh:
赌注是如果艾咪赢了
杰克就要把车子送给她

translation.en: IT'S AN OLD MUSTANG, AND IT'S PRETTY SWEET.
translation.zh: 那是一部旧的福特野马 但很漂亮

translation.en: IF HE GETS MORE ARRESTS, SHE HAS TO GO ON A DATE WITH HIM.
translation.zh: 如果杰克赢了 艾咪就要跟他约会

translation.en: HE GUARANTEES IT WILL END IN SEX.
translation.zh: 他保证最后一定会跟她上床

translation.en: I BET ON AT LEAST SOME OVER-THE-CLOTHES ACTION. AT THE VERY LEAST, SOME TOUCHING...
translation.zh:
我猜至少会隔着衣服亲热
互相抚摸一下

translation.en: NO, THAT'S ENOUGH, GINA. CARESSES.
translation.zh: 够了 吉娜

translation.en: I COULD SEE HIM SHOWING UP IN A SILK ROBE.
translation.zh: 他的躯体在丝质睡袍下若隐若现

translation.en: THAT'S ENOUGH, GINA. ALL RIGHT. THANK YOU.
translation.zh: 够了 吉娜 谢谢你

translation.en: (Jake) LET THE WASTING OF TIME BEGIN.
translation.zh:
（摩根托的公寓大楼
　逐户调查 下午1点45分） 开始来浪费时间吧

translation.en: HELLO, SIR. CAN WE ASK YOU A FEW QUESTIONS?
translation.zh: 先生 你好 能问你几个问题吗？

translation.en: DEFINITELY. YEAH.
translation.zh: 当然可以

translation.en: I'M ACTUALLY--I'M SUPER GLAD YOU GUYS ARE HERE RIGHT NOW.
translation.zh: 其实我很高兴你们来了

translation.en: ARE YOU SMELLING THAT WEED SMELL?
translation.zh:
-有闻到大麻味吗？
-有

translation.en: (both) YEAH. 'CAUSE A DUDE BROKE IN, SMOKED WEED, AND BOLTED. [laughing] IT'S--
translation.zh:
因为刚才有人闯进来
抽了大麻后又跑掉了

translation.en: DO YOU THINK IT'S THE SAME DUDE THAT LEFT THAT BONG THERE ON THE FLOOR?
translation.zh:
跟把吸食器留在地上的那个人
是同一个人吗？

translation.en: YES.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: POLICE!
translation.zh: 警察

translation.en: HELLO. HELLO.
translation.zh:
-你好
-你好

translation.en: WHAT'S YOUR NAME? MY NAME? MM-HMM.
translation.zh:
-你的大名？
-我的名字？米利普诺斯

translation.en: MLEPNOS. CAN YOU SPELL THAT, PLEASE?
translation.zh: 怎么写？

translation.en: M-L-E-P... CLAY.
translation.zh: 米…利…普…克雷

translation.en: DID YOU SAY "CLAY"?
translation.zh: 你说克雷吗？

translation.en: YES, THE "CLAY" IS SILENT.
translation.zh: 克雷这两个字是不发音的

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, GOT IT.
translation.zh: 好 我懂了 有看过这个人吗？他昨晚被枪杀了

translation.en: HAVE YOU SEEN THIS MAN BEFORE? HE WAS SHOT LAST NIGHT.
translation.zh: 有看过这个人吗？他昨晚被枪杀了

translation.en: OH. THANK YOU.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: NO, SIR, THAT'S OURS. WE NEED THAT. WE-- AND HE KEPT IT.
translation.zh:
-不 这是我们的 还要用呢
-他拿走了

translation.en: WALL STREET JOURNAL ON THE DOORMAT... TOP FLOOR APARTMENT.
translation.zh:
门口地垫上有一份《华尔街日报》
又是顶楼公寓

translation.en: 20 BUCKS SAYS THIS GUY'S LIKE A HOT, ELIGIBLE BACHELOR.
translation.zh: 二十块赌这个人是性感的黄金单身汉

translation.en: I'LL TAKE THAT ACTION.
translation.zh: 赌局成立

translation.en: POLICE! OPEN UP!
translation.zh: 警察 开门

translation.en: HELLO.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: [laughing] OH! HELLO, SIR! HOW ARE YOU TODAY?
translation.zh: 你好 先生 今天过得好吗？

translation.en: I AM DETECTIVE RIGHT-ALL-THE-TIME,
translation.zh: 我是“百发百中警探”

translation.en: AND THIS IS MY PARTNER DETECTIVE TERRIBLE DETECTIVE.
translation.zh: 而这位是我的搭档“九流警探”

translation.en: NO SURPRISES FROM THE CORONER. A FEW GUNSHOTS, SHOULDER AND CHEST.
translation.zh:
法医没有新发现
肩膀和胸口 共中了两枪

translation.en: NONE OF THE NEIGHBORS HEARD OR SAW ANYTHING.
translation.zh: 没有邻居听到或看到什么

translation.en: AND WHAT'S WORSE, SANTIAGO STRUCK OUT WITH A 92-YEAR-OLD.
translation.zh:
更糟糕的是
桑蒂亚戈跟92岁的老头擦不出火花

translation.en: THAT IS NOT ACCURATE, SIR. WAIT, YOU HOOKED UP WITH HIM? UGH!
translation.zh:
-不全然如此
-你勾搭上他了吗？

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, HIT THE PAWN SHOPS AND CANVASS THE NEIGHBORHOOD. AND WHILE YOU'RE OUT, YOU CAN BUY YOURSELF A TIE.
translation.zh:
调查一下当铺和周边区域
去给自己买条领带

translation.en: (Jake) OH, ACTUALLY, SIR... I'M WEARING A TIE RIGHT NOW.
translation.zh: 长官 其实我有打领带了

translation.en: CHECK IT OUT.
translation.zh: 看吧

translation.en: SECRET TIE.
translation.zh: 隐藏版领带 首先 你的体毛剃得太干净了

translation.en: FIRST OF ALL, I THINK YOU'RE KIND OF OVERDOING IT
translation.zh: 首先 你的体毛剃得太干净了

translation.en: WITH THE MANSCAPING.
translation.zh:
首先 你的体毛剃得太干净了 但更重要的是
为什么你不肯认真执行我的命令？

translation.en: BUT MORE IMPORTANTLY, DETECTIVE, WHY DO YOU REFUSE TO TAKE MY ORDERS SERIOUSLY?
translation.zh:
但更重要的是
为什么你不肯认真执行我的命令？

translation.en: DOES ANYONE HERE KNOW WHY IT'S SO IMPORTANT TO ME THAT YOU ALL DRESS APPROPRIATELY?
translation.zh:
你们知道你们穿着得宜
为什么如此重要吗？

translation.en: HMM. FOUR HIGHLY TRAINED DETECTIVES AND NOT ONE OF YOU CAN SOLVE THIS SIMPLE MYSTERY.
translation.zh:
四名训练有素的警探
竟然都答不出这么简单的问题

translation.en: I WANNA BE BRIEFED ON ANY NEW DEVELOPMENTS. ANY QUESTIONS?
translation.zh:
有任何新进展就向我报告
还有问题吗？

translation.en: I WAS GONNA ASK YOU IF YOU THOUGHT I WAS DOING TOO MUCH MANSCAPING, BUT WE SOLVED THAT ONE.
translation.zh:
我体毛剃得太干净吗？
你刚回答了 所以我没问题了

translation.en: HEY, BOYLE. YEP. WHAT ABOUT THIS FANCY HAM STUFF?
translation.zh: 博伊尔 不如查一下这条顶级火腿

translation.en: JAMON IBERICO. YES.
translation.zh: 伊比利亚火腿

translation.en: THE PERP LEFT A REALLY EXPENSIVE TV BUT THEN STOLE HAM? IT DOESN'T MAKE SENSE.
translation.zh:
歹徒留下昂贵的电视却偷走了火腿
这根本不合理

translation.en: IS THERE A PLACE NEARBY THE CRIME SCENE THAT SELLS IT?
translation.zh: 犯罪现场附近有卖这个吗？

translation.en: BENEFICIO'S MIGHT. LET'S GO.
translation.zh:
-多益市场可能会有
-走吧

translation.en: YOU GOTTA BRIEF THE C.O. FIRST.
translation.zh:
-应该先跟局长报告
-等抓到人再来报告吧

translation.en: WE'LL BRIEF HIM AFTER WE CATCH THE GUY.
translation.zh:
-应该先跟局长报告
-等抓到人再来报告吧 （多益美食市场 下午1点45分）

translation.en: MY NAME IS RATKO. I DON'T KNOW ANYTHING.
translation.zh: 我名叫拉特科 我什么都不知道

translation.en: OH, OKAY. YOU RECOGNIZE THIS GUY?
translation.zh: 好 你认得这个人吗？

translation.en: HENRY MORGENTHAU? NO.
translation.zh:
-认识亨利摩根托？
-不认识

translation.en: MAYBE ACTUALLY LOOK AT THE PICTURE.
translation.zh: 你先看看照片再回答

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW HIM. I DON'T KNOW WHAT HAPPENED.
translation.zh: 我不认识他 也不知道发生什么事

translation.en: NO MORE QUESTIONS.
translation.zh: 别再问我了

translation.en: WELL, WHY DON'T I RUN A SCENARIO PAST YOU, RATKO, AND YOU TELL ME WHAT YOU THINK?
translation.zh:
不如我跟你说一套情节
你再告诉我你的看法

translation.en: YOU DO KNOW MORGENTHAU. HE CAME IN HERE AND TRIED TO SELL YOU SOME HAMS.
translation.zh:
你是认识摩根托的
他想要把火腿卖给你

translation.en: YOU KNEW THEY WERE WORTH A LOTTA MONEY, SO YOU TRIED TO STEAL THEM FROM HIM
translation.zh:
火腿很值钱
所以你想趁他不在家时把它偷走

translation.en: WHEN HE WASN'T HOME. ONLY HE WAS HOME, SO YOU SHOT HIM. DOES THAT SOUND FAMILIAR?
translation.zh:
不料他刚好在家 所以你枪杀了他
听起来很熟悉吗？

translation.en: UH, MAYBE SOME ROLE PLAY WILL JOG YOUR MEMORY?
translation.zh:
或许玩角色扮演有助于
唤起你的记忆？

translation.en: GREAT IDEA. OKAY, YEAH. OKAY.
translation.zh:
-好主意
-没错

translation.en: SO I'M--I'M RATKO. NO, NO, I'M RATKO.
translation.zh:
-我演拉特科
-不 我演拉特科

translation.en: COME ON. I'M ALWAYS THE VICTIM.
translation.zh: 别这样 每次都是我演受害者

translation.en: LOOK, I'M DOING THIS WITH YOU RIGHT HERE. FINE, FINE. [clears throat]
translation.zh:
-现在不是争论这个的时候
-好吧

translation.en: OH! I'M HENRY MORGENTHAU, OWNER OF DELICIOUS AND EXPENSIVE HAMS.
translation.zh:
我是亨利摩根托
拥有美味又昂贵的火腿

translation.en: DON'T I KNOW YOU FROM THE GROCERY STORE?
translation.zh: 我是不是在食品市场见过你？

translation.en: KILL! AND SCENE.
translation.zh: 杀死你 这就是事发经过

translation.en: (Jake) NYPD! EVERYONE DOWN!
translation.zh: 纽约市警局 所有人蹲下来

translation.en: MA'AM, IF YOU COULD JUST GET DOWN, OR...IGNORE ME AND CONTINUE SHOPPING.
translation.zh:
女士 请你蹲下来
或者别理我并继续购物

translation.en: BOYLE, GET THE DOOR! ON IT!
translation.zh:
-博伊尔 守住门口
-没问题

translation.en: RATKO!
translation.zh: 拉特科

translation.en: [grunts] OH!
translation.zh: 快来支援

translation.en: (Jake) OW, RATKO, OW! WHOA, WHOA, WHOA, WHOA, RATKO!
translation.zh: 拉特科

translation.en: I'M GETTING MAD! THAT'S A WASTE OF MANCHEGO!
translation.zh:
-我要生气了
-这是在浪费曼彻格奶酪

translation.en: CHARLES!
translation.zh: 查尔斯

translation.en: HOW ARE YOU STILL HERE? JAKE! LITTLE HELP!
translation.zh:
-你怎么还在这里？
-杰克 帮帮我

translation.en: RATKO! HE'S NOT GOING ANYWHERE, JAKE!
translation.zh: 他跑不掉的

translation.en: [bottle clanging] RATKO!
translation.zh: 拉特科

translation.en: I GOT HIM! I GOT HIM! DON'T WORRY!
translation.zh: 我逮住他了

translation.en: (Jake) SO NO, I DID NOT BRIEF YOU. AND YES, HE DID GET AWAY.
translation.zh:
不 我没有向你报告
是 他的确跑掉了

translation.en: BUT SOME BONUS GOOD NEWS...
translation.zh: 但我有额外的好消息

translation.en: I GOT YOU HAZELNUT.
translation.zh: 我给你买了榛果冰激凌

translation.en: [whispering] AND... A LITTLE SPOON THERE FOR YOU.
translation.zh: 还有一支小汤匙

translation.en: [scoffs] IS HE SERIOUSLY ASSIGNING ME TO THE RECORDS ROOM?
translation.zh: 他派我来档案室工作？

translation.en: I MEAN, WHY DO WE EVEN HAVE A RECORDS ROOM? COMPUTER'S BEEN INVENTED, RIGHT? I DIDN'T DREAM IT?
translation.zh:
干嘛还要设立档案室？
电脑已经问世了 不是吗？

translation.en: YOU'RE LUCKY, MAN. I WISH I COULD GET ASSIGNED HERE FULL-TIME.
translation.zh:
你真幸运
我巴不得被派来这里做全职人员

translation.en: YOU COULD NOT BE FARTHER FROM THE ACTION.
translation.zh:
保证可以远离危险 警官 你知道的
我的破案数字是全局之冠

translation.en: SERGEANT, YOU KNOW ME. I HAVE MORE ARRESTS THAN ANYONE.
translation.zh:
警官 你知道的
我的破案数字是全局之冠

translation.en: WILL YOU PLEASE TELL THE CAPTAIN HOW DUMB IT IS TO LOCK HIS BEST DETECTIVE IN A FILE CABINET?
translation.zh:
告诉局长 把全局最优秀的警探
关在档案室里是不智的

translation.en: SECOND BEST. YOU'RE WRONG ABOUT HOLT.
translation.zh:
-是第二优秀才对
-你误会霍尔特了

translation.en: THAT MAN HAS FORGOTTEN MORE ABOUT BEING A COP THAN YOU WILL EVER KNOW.
translation.zh: 他走过的桥比你走过的路还多

translation.en: IN 1981, HE CAUGHT THE DISCO STRANGLER.
translation.zh: 1981年 他逮捕了“舞厅勒人魔”

translation.en: IT'S OVER, DISCO MAN!
translation.zh: 没戏唱了 舞厅怪客

translation.en: PUT DOWN THE YO-YO AND BACK AWAY FROM THE GIRL.
translation.zh: 把溜溜球放下 离那个女孩远一点

translation.en: WOW. THE MAN IS THE REAL DEAL.
translation.zh:
-哇
-那家伙是实力派的

translation.en: YOU NEED TO LISTEN TO HIM.
translation.zh: 你该好好听他的话

translation.en: GONNA BE HARD TO WIN OUR BET WHEN YOU'RE ON THE BENCH, PERALTA.
translation.zh: 你坐冷板凳的话就很难赢得了我

translation.en: ALTHOUGH I DID START A NEW CATEGORY.
translation.zh: 所以我开了新的赌局

translation.en: "MURDERERS WE LET GO." AND LOOK AT THAT. YOU'RE WINNING.
translation.zh: “跑掉的杀人犯” 快看 你领先了

translation.en: HAVE FUN WITH YOUR FILES. YEAH, YOU KNOW WHAT, I WILL HAVE FUN WITH MY FILES. HAVE FUN WITH YOUR FACE!
translation.zh:
-在档案堆里玩得开心一点
-我会的 你继续得意吧

translation.en: SLAM! THAT WAS A SLAM.
translation.zh: 摔门 刚才是摔门声

translation.en: SO WHAT MOVIE DID YOU GET US TICKETS TO?
translation.zh: 你买了哪出电影的票？

translation.en: OH, WELL, JUST TO BE SAFE, I BOUGHT TICKETS TO ALL OF THEM.
translation.zh:
为了保险起见
所有电影的票我都买了

translation.en: JUST TO BE SAFE? WHAT DOES THAT MEAN?
translation.zh: 为了保险起见？那是什么意思？

translation.en: I DON'T KNOW, I DIDN'T WANNA MESS UP.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我不想搞砸了 因为你总是意见多多

translation.en: BECAUSE YOU'RE SORT OF... OPINIONATED.
translation.zh: 我不想搞砸了 因为你总是意见多多

translation.en: YOU THINK I'M OPINIONATED? OKAY, HERE'S AN OPINION FOR YOU.
translation.zh:
你说我意见多多？
那我现在就来发表意见

translation.en: YOU'RE A BAD JUDGE OF CHARACTER AND YOUR SHIRT LOOKS LIKE VOMIT.
translation.zh:
你看人的眼光很差劲
你的衬衫看起来像呕吐物

translation.en: SO WE CAN GO SEE NORTH BY NORTHWEST. WE'RE NOT SEEING A MOVIE TOGETHER.
translation.zh:
-我们可以去看《西北偏北》
-我不会跟你一起去看电影了

translation.en: GOOD CALL. SMART.
translation.zh: 好主意 明智的决定

translation.en: KEEP IT PROFESH.
translation.zh: 发挥专业精神

translation.en: HEY, CAPTAIN. SO YOU FOUND SOMETHING?
translation.zh:
-局长
-有新发现吗？

translation.en: HEY, I LIKE THE TIE.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的领带

translation.en: IF YOU CAN'T BEAT 'EM, JOIN 'EM. ANYWAY, I THINK I GOT SOMETHING GOOD HERE.
translation.zh:
无力胜之则从之
总之我找到了有用的线索

translation.en: TURNS OUT THE NAME "RATKO" IS MADE UP.
translation.zh: 原来“拉特科”这个名字是假的

translation.en: BUT I WAS DIGGING THROUGH THESE FILES--
translation.zh: 但翻阅这些档案时

translation.en: ONE OF WHICH I LITERALLY FOUND IN A SPIDER WEB--
translation.zh: 其中一份真的是在蜘蛛网里找到的

translation.en: AND IT TURNS OUT THERE WERE A BUNCH OF REFERENCES TO A SERBIAN THUG,
translation.zh:
结果发现了
一名塞尔维亚恶汉的资料

translation.en: STREET NAMES "THE RAT" AND "THE BUTCHER,"
translation.zh: 江湖上人称“老鼠”和“屠夫”

translation.en: WHO'S KNOWN TO HANG OUT AT A STORAGE UNIT NEAR BOERUM PARK, WHICH HAS RED SOIL,
translation.zh:
他经常在波伦公园附近的仓库出没
那里有红色泥土

translation.en: HENCE, THE MUDDY RED FOOTPRINT ON MORGENTHAU'S COUNTER.
translation.zh:
因此才会在摩根托的流理台上
留下红泥脚印

translation.en: THAT'S FINE WORK, DETECTIVE. THANK YOU VERY MUCH, SIR.
translation.zh:
-做得好 警探
-谢谢夸奖 局长

translation.en: TESTAMENT TO WHAT CAN BE ACHIEVED WHEN YOU DRESS APPROPRIATELY.
translation.zh: 这证明了穿着得宜就能事半功倍

translation.en: LET'S POUND IT OUT.
translation.zh: 来击拳一下吧

translation.en: YOU KNOW WHAT, SUCH FINE POLICE WORK,
translation.zh: 你知道吗？你的表现如此出色

translation.en: LET'S SHARE IT WITH THE WHOLE TEAM.
translation.zh: 应该要跟整个团队分享才对

translation.en: SANTIAGO! BOYLE! DIAZ! GET IN HERE!
translation.zh:
桑蒂亚戈 博伊尔 迪亚兹
快点进来

translation.en: BRING EVERYONE! AND A CAMERA!
translation.zh: 把所有人叫来 带着照相机

translation.en: THAT'S NOT NECESSARY. OH, THEY'RE HERE!
translation.zh: 没这个必要吧

translation.en: LET'S HAVE A HAND FOR THE WORK
translation.zh:
为优秀的杰克普拉尔塔警探
出色的表现鼓掌一下

translation.en: OF THE FINE MASTER DETECTIVE, JAKE PERALTA.
translation.zh:
为优秀的杰克普拉尔塔警探
出色的表现鼓掌一下 各位 鼓掌吧 给他一点掌声

translation.en: YEAH, LET'S HAVE A HAND, EVERYONE.
translation.zh: 各位 鼓掌吧 给他一点掌声

translation.en: GIVE HIM A HAND. YEAH, NICE!
translation.zh: 不错嘛

translation.en: [wolf whistle] LOOKING GOOD! YEAH. THANK YOU.
translation.zh:
-很好看啊
-好吧 谢谢大家

translation.en: (Amy) NO RECORD OF RATKO ON THE LEDGER.
translation.zh:
（布鲁克林自助仓库
　晚上10点14分） 账本上没有拉特科的名字
肯定是用现金

translation.en: MUST'VE USED CASH.
translation.zh:
账本上没有拉特科的名字
肯定是用现金

translation.en: WELL, I, FOR ONE, AM JUST PUMPED TO BE ON A STAKEOUT WITH YOU, CAPTAIN.
translation.zh:
局长 跟你一起执行监视任务
我感到很兴奋

translation.en: YOU KNOW WHAT MY FAVORITE THING ABOUT STAKEOUTS IS?
translation.zh: 你知道我最喜欢监视任务的哪一点？

translation.en: PATROL GUIDE SAYS "NO DRESS CODE."
translation.zh: 工作指南上注明“服装不拘”

translation.en: SO I'M JUST THE ZIP-UP HOODIE AND MY TWO BEST FRIENDS.
translation.zh:
穿件连帽外套就行了
还能跟两个好朋友在一起

translation.en: DOES HE ALWAYS TALK THIS MUCH?
translation.zh: 他一向这么多话吗？

translation.en: I JUST TUNE IT OUT. IT'S LIKE A WHITE NOISE MACHINE.
translation.zh:
我就当没听见
他根本是一部白色的噪音机

translation.en: OKAY, FIRST OF ALL, THAT'S RACIST.
translation.zh: 首先 那是种族歧视

translation.en: SECONDLY, CAPTAIN,
translation.zh: 其次 局长

translation.en: TERRY TOLD ME YOU CAUGHT THE DISCO STRANGLER.
translation.zh:
泰瑞告诉我
是你逮到“舞厅勒人魔”的

translation.en: THAT'S INCREDIBLE. I'VE READ THAT CASE.
translation.zh: 好厉害 我看过那个案子的档案

translation.en: WITH ALL DUE RESPECT, SIR, WHY'D IT TAKE YOU SO LONG TO GET YOUR FIRST COMMAND?
translation.zh: 恕我冒昧 你怎么现在才当上局长？

translation.en: BECAUSE I'M GAY. [chuckles] AH.
translation.zh: 因为我是同性恋

translation.en: SERIOUSLY?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: I'M SURPRISED YOU DIDN'T KNOW.
translation.zh: 我很意外你还不晓得

translation.en: I DON'T TRY TO HIDE IT.
translation.zh: 我从来没有刻意隐瞒

translation.en: DID ANYONE ELSE GET A LITTLE BIT OF A GAY VIBE?
translation.zh: （出柜局长获任命） 有人闻到同性恋的味道吗？

translation.en: [slowed down] MANSCAPING.
translation.zh: 剃毛

translation.en: DAMN!
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: I AM NOT A GOOD DETECTIVE.
translation.zh: 我不是一个出色的警探

translation.en: (Rosa) HERE. I FEEL BAD THAT YOU SPENT ALL THAT MONEY ON THE MOVIE TICKETS.
translation.zh:
拿去吧 你花钱买了电影票
我感到过意不去

translation.en: WHY DON'T YOU JUST GO TO THE MOVIES WITH ME? NOPE.
translation.zh:
-跟我一起去看电影吧
-不要

translation.en: OKAY.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: WELL, THIS IS AWKWARD.
translation.zh: 这气氛真尴尬

translation.en: IT'S NOT AWKWARD.
translation.zh: 不会尴尬

translation.en: I LIKE YOUR COMPANY. YOU'RE SWEET.
translation.zh: 我喜欢有你陪我 你是个好人

translation.en: WHEN DID YOU COME OUT?
translation.zh: 你什么时候出柜的？

translation.en: ABOUT 25 YEARS AGO.
translation.zh: 大约25年前

translation.en: THE NYPD WAS NOT READY FOR AN OPENLY GAY DETECTIVE.
translation.zh:
当时纽约市警局
还没办法接纳一个出柜的警探

translation.en: BUT THEN THE OLD GUARD DIED OUT.
translation.zh: 但后来那些老顽固死光了

translation.en: SUDDENLY, THEY COULDN'T WAIT TO SHOW OFF THE FACT THAT THEY HAD A HIGHLY RANKING GAY OFFICER.
translation.zh:
突然间 他们迫不及待要召告天下
这里有个同性恋的高阶警官

translation.en: I MADE CAPTAIN. BUT THEY PUT ME IN A PUBLIC AFFAIRS UNIT.
translation.zh:
我当上了主管
不过被安排在公共事务部门

translation.en: I WAS A GOOD SOLDIER. I HELPED RECRUITMENT.
translation.zh: 我很敬业 我卖力做招募工作

translation.en: BUT ALL I EVER REALLY WANTED WAS MY OWN COMMAND.
translation.zh: 但我一直以来想要做的是真正的局长

translation.en: AND NOW I FINALLY GOT IT.
translation.zh: 现在我终于当上了

translation.en: AND I'M NOT GONNA SCREW IT UP.
translation.zh: 我绝对不能搞砸

translation.en: CAPTAIN, I'M SORRY. I-- I FEEL LIKE A JACKASS.
translation.zh: 局长 对不起 我觉得我很白痴

translation.en: BUT ON THE FLIP SIDE, THERE'S RATKO.
translation.zh: 但另一方面 拉特科出现了

translation.en: HUMILITY OVER. I'M AMAZING!
translation.zh: 谦虚够了 我好厉害呀

translation.en: FANTASTIC. 3,000 IDENTICAL BLUE DOORS.
translation.zh: 太好了 三千扇一模一样的蓝色门

translation.en: LOOKS LIKE WE ALL GOT DOOR DUTY.
translation.zh: 只好一起展开“逐户调查”了

translation.en: AH, YEAH. FROM BEFORE.
translation.zh: 只好一起展开“逐户调查”了 没错 跟之前一样

translation.en: GOOD ONE. YOU LOOK GREAT.
translation.zh: 好主意 你看起来很美

translation.en: CLEAR.
translation.zh: 安全

translation.en: CLEAR.
translation.zh: 安全

translation.en: [sighs] OKAY.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: UNBELIEVABLE! UN-BELIEVABLE!
translation.zh: 太扯了

translation.en: RATKO, GREAT TO SEE YOU.
translation.zh: 拉特科 很高兴见到你

translation.en: YOU CAN'T STOP ME.
translation.zh: 你阻挡不了我的

translation.en: I'M GOING.
translation.zh: 我要走了

translation.en: ACTUALLY, YOU'RE NOT GOING ANYWHERE.
translation.zh: 事实上 你逃不掉了

translation.en: 'CAUSE IF YOU TAKE A LOOK TO YOUR LEFT, YOU'LL SEE DETECTIVE'S BOYLE AND DIAZ.
translation.zh:
看看你的左边
你会看到博伊尔和迪亚兹警探

translation.en: RIGHT THERE IS DETECTIVE SANTIAGO.
translation.zh: 右边有桑蒂亚戈警探

translation.en: AND BEHIND YOU IS CAPTAIN HOLT.
translation.zh: 你的身后有霍尔特局长

translation.en: POINT IS... MY TEAM HAS YOU SURROUNDED.
translation.zh: 重点是 你被我们的团队包围了

translation.en: OH, MY GOD, I JUST GOT THE TIE THING!
translation.zh: 天啊 我刚想通打领带的事了

translation.en: CAPTAIN, I JUST FIGURED IT OUT.
translation.zh: 局长 我明白其中的道理了

translation.en: MAYBE NOW'S NOT THE BEST TIME, DETECTIVE.
translation.zh: 警探 现在不是说这个的最佳时机

translation.en: IT'S A UNIFORM!
translation.zh: 那等同于制服

translation.en: WE'RE A TEAM, AND THE TIE IS A PART OF THAT TEAM'S UNIFORM, RIGHT?
translation.zh:
我们是一个团队
领带就是团队制服的一部分 对吧？

translation.en: YOU ASK RATKO WHAT TEAM? NO, RATKO, SHUT UP.
translation.zh:
-你问拉特科是什么队？
-不是 拉特科 你闭嘴

translation.en: IT'S IMPORTANT TO YOU BECAUSE YOU WERE KEPT OFF THE TEAM FOR SO LONG.
translation.zh: 这点很重要 因为你被迫离队太久了

translation.en: AND NOW YOU'RE THE COACH, AND YOU WANT US TO ALL WEAR THAT SAME UNIFORM.
translation.zh:
现在你当上了教练
所以你希望我们穿上统一的制服

translation.en: BOOM! NAILED IT!
translation.zh:
-砰 我想通了
-没错

translation.en: YES, YOU DID. NOW JUST ARREST RATKO.
translation.zh:
-砰 我想通了
-没错 马上逮捕拉特科吧

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, RATKO, DOWN. DROP THE WEAPON.
translation.zh: 拉特科 跪下 放下武器

translation.en: HANDS ON YOUR HEAD. HERE WE GO.
translation.zh: 双手放在头上 快点

translation.en: HEY! HE'S RUNNING!
translation.zh: 他要逃跑了

translation.en: HANDS BEHIND YOUR BACK! HANDS BEHIND YOUR BACK!
translation.zh: 双手放在背后

translation.en: (Boyle) STAY DOWN.
translation.zh: 趴下

translation.en: THAT'S HOW WE DO IT IN THE NINE-NINE, SIR.
translation.zh: 局长 我们99分局就是这样办案的

translation.en: CATCH BAD GUYS AND LOOK GOOD DOING IT.
translation.zh: 逮住坏蛋 同时要摆出帅气的样子

translation.en: WHAT'S WRONG WITH YOU?
translation.zh: 你怎么了？

translation.en: NEVER TOOK OFF THE SPEEDO. BIG MISTAKE.
translation.zh: 没有把泳裤脱掉 真是一大错误

translation.en: IT IS INSIDE ME. GREAT WORK, TEAM!
translation.zh: 它卡进股沟里了 干得好 队友们

translation.en: NOT A DOCTOR. SHH!
translation.zh: 我不是医生
